description: The folks of Golden make it their goal to eat at Smokey J’s BBQ truck as much as possible, because his selection of sandwiches, ribs, and delicious country-style sides is some of the tastiest grub you’ll find in the whole area.The juicy, plump pulled pork is the talk of the town, the succulent ribs and smoked brisket will bring you back time and again, the buttery cornbread and sweet & savory baked beans perfectly accompany these tasty meats, and that’s not even all. For a memorable and mouthwatering eating experience, be sure to make your way to Smokey J’s A-S-A-P.
name: Smokey J's BBQ
